name: bedchamber
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a bedroom: This film about Henry VIII is set, almost entirely, in the king's bedchamber. The bedchamber was hung with the finest silks.
More examplesFewer examplesThe maid slept in a small ante-room close to the royal bedchamber. A serving wench spotted his shoes outside her mistress's bedchamber.In this scene, the doomed hero carries his innocent bride to their bedchamber.The concubines were supposedly delivered to the emperor's bedchamber naked inside a roll of silk.
